price: Os que são fiéis ao pacto de Allah e não desfazem a aliança,
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُوفُونَ بِعَهۡدِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا يَنقُضُونَ ٱلۡمِيثَٰقَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yūfūna biʿahdi al-lahi walā yanquḍūna al-mīthāqa
